rows.label: qev096101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey there. Are you settling in all right?
Getting used to life as a BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev096101_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that it is second nature to you now.

rows.label: qev096101_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev096101_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that things are still a bit unfamiliar.

rows.label: qev096101_JNK0030
rows.name: Complain

rows.label: qev096101_SEL0031
rows.name: Gripe about how Elma is too harsh.

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0002
rows.name: Excellent. Glad to hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0003
rows.name:
I know you've been through the damn wringer lately,
but you're still doing good work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0004
rows.name: Only natural, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0005
rows.name:
For some, it's an indigen attack that does them in.
For others, it's the slow grind of tough missions that
eventually wears 'em down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0006
rows.name: You're tough, though. Adaptable. You're doing well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0007
rows.name: Gya hah hah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0008
rows.name: Glad to hear you and the boss are getting along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'll take it that means you're well used to BLADE work,
as well as life on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0010
rows.name: Anything to ask me about? Any worries or requests?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0011
rows.name:
No need to hold back—I'm in a good mood today,
so your head will probably stay on your shoulders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0012
rows.name:
It's only natural for a commander to want to keep tabs
on his people, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0013
rows.name: So come on! Lay it on me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_JNK0040
rows.name: Talk about Pay

rows.label: qev096101_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask Vandham to double the
reward for your next mission.

rows.label: qev096101_JNK0050
rows.name: Talk about Skells

rows.label: qev096101_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that you would like to pilot a Skell.

rows.label: qev096101_JNK0060
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev096101_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that you are satisfied with the current situation.

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0014
rows.name: You got it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0015
rows.name: Pay doubled. Done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0016
rows.name:
You realize this means I'm sending you on a mission
that's twice as dangerous, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0017
rows.name: Gyaaaa hah hah hah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0019
rows.name: .....[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0020
rows.name: That was a joke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0021
rows.name:
But seriously, what's with the dollar signs in your eyes?
You saving up to buy a new Skell or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0022
rows.name: Wait a minute...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0023
rows.name: You don't even have an old Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0024
rows.name: Hell, you don't even have a Skell LICENSE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0025
rows.name: Whoops. Sorry about that. Oversight on my part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Put someone with your skills behind the wheel of a
Skell, and you'd be a force of nature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0027
rows.name:
I should've put you in line to get your Skell license
first thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0028
rows.name:
Better to have it than not, right? So let's hurry up and
get you cleared to pilot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0029
rows.name: Oh yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0030
rows.name: That's right, I forgot you didn't have one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0031
rows.name: Wait, you don't even have a Skell LICENSE, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0032
rows.name: Whoops. Sorry about that. Oversight on my part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0033
rows.name: You need a license to pilot a Skell, see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0034
rows.name:
We only issue 'em to BLADEs with a proven track
record. That way we know they have the skill to make
use of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0035
rows.name:
Given your track record, I'm tempted to issue you one
right now, but it ain't standard operating procedure.
Wouldn't be fair to the others, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0036
rows.name: But clear the license exam, and it's all yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0037
rows.name:
Gya hah hah!
You're a real cheap date, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0038
rows.name:
But seriously, speak up. And don't say you're filing a
harassment complaint about the "cheap date" thing,
because it was a goddamn joke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0039
rows.name: These are dangerous missions. People die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0040
rows.name:
If you're feeling even a bit distracted or dissatisfied—
or if we're somehow not giving you what you need—
you could end up hurt or dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0041
rows.name: Even a Skell can only protect you from so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0042
rows.name: ...Actually, wait. You don't have a Skell yet, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0043
rows.name: Wait, you don't even have a LICENSE yet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0044
rows.name: Whoops. Sorry about that. Oversight on my part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0045
rows.name:
Put someone with your skills behind the wheel of a
Skell, and you'd be a force of nature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0046
rows.name:
I should've put you in line to get your Skell license
first thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0047
rows.name:
Better to have it than not, right? So let's hurry up and
get you cleared to pilot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0048
rows.name:
Once you get your eight certifications done,
go tell Walter in the hangars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0049
rows.name:
Then once you pass the final exam, you'll officially be a
Skell pilot. Pretty exciting, yeah? Ha! Sure it is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0050
rows.name:
But getting you in a Skell will be good news for us
BLADEs, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev096101_MSG0051
rows.name: I've got high hopes for you. Good luck![ST:wait ]
